content.prompt: Spectators in the amphitheater would frequently have witnessed

choices.label: gladiators and wild animals being lifted into view from the substructure
chariots emerging for races from the arched gateways
Christian martyrs being led in from the catacombs below
orators standing in the arena to give speeches about matters of government

topic.text: 2.1: Cultural Contexts of Ancient Mediterranean Art
